snippet: With his newborn son released from a hospital, deGrom will pitch a simulated game Tuesday and could start one of the Mets’ games at Atlanta later this week.
lead_paragraph: With his newborn son released from a hospital, deGrom will pitch a simulated game Tuesday and could start one of the Mets’ games at Atlanta later this week.

headline.main: Jacob deGrom Looks to Rejoin Mets
